message: Hi Bob, I'm interested in selling you this great product. I think you'll really like it!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?
I understand you're interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of meeting you at $110. I'm willing to compromise, but I need to make a profit.
I understand your concerns about making a profit, but I'm still looking to save some money. Would you be willing to meet me at $105? I'm willing to compromise, but I'm not willing to go above that.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I think the product is worth more than $105. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $105 and my previous offer of $110, so I'm thinking of $107.50. Is that something you'd be interested in?
I understand your point, but I'm still looking to save some money. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $105 and $107.50, so I'm thinking of $106.25. Would you be willing to meet me there?
